title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Rush blamed for protests, but Tucker Carlson is right, people aren't protesting because of Rush, they have minds of their own. Stanford study of Santa Clara County shows similar mortality rate as the flu. Dennis Prager: If half of the nation's deaths were in Montana, would New York City shut down? Thomas Friedman reveals his New York centrism. Senator Kennedy: Lives vs. livelihoods. Democrats want to keep economy closed. Scarf Queen dodges question on studies that show much larger infection rates, much lower mortality rates in California. Palm Beach drone captures photo of Pelican. Trump temporarily suspends immigration. Democrats say we can't go back to normal until we have a vaccine, okay, so no immigration until then. New Jersey uses ChiCom drone to spy on citizens. If suspending immigration saves one life, isn't it worth it?

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Albright calls Trump's immigration suspension "un-American". Cuomo should put a mask on the Statue of Liberty. Rasmussen: 60% of Americans blame Trump more than China for coronavirus. Democrats cruel to put Biden out there with dementia. Hollywood fears coronavirus will end sex scenes. Caller on shaming protesters by saying they put healthcare workers at risk. Democrat Senator Chris Murphy: Blame Trump, not China for coronavirus. What did Xi Jinping know and when did he know it? DeSantis was right, Florida hospitalization rates remain low. Jacksonville mayor says opening beaches was right move. If it saves just one life, it's worth opening the economy.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

EIB audience model projects audience of 42 million listeners. David Marcus piece in The Federalist. America can and will get back to normal. Human beings always adapt, always learn how to deal with inevitable death. Farm caller on the food supply chain. John Roberts asks the Scarf Queen about the USC study. The Stanford and USC studies are good news, not bad news. If many more people than previously thought have the virus, then the mortality rate is much lower. ChiCom-owned closed Smithfield pork plant in South Dakota. Harvard scientist lies about ties to Wuhan university.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
